title: Illinois Firm Recalls Pork Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 17, 2015 Kalle USA, a Chicago, Ill., establishment, is recalling approximately 168,473 pounds of pork products that were not presented at the U.S. point of entry for inspection, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. Without the...
